entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 100 to 150 mm of rain, especially in the ranges. Thunderstorms possible. Peak rates of 15 to 25 mm/h, but 25 to 40 mm/h in possible localised downpours from Saturday afternoon through to early Sunday morning. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Low.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 80 to 120 mm of rain, especially in the ranges. Thunderstorms possible. Peak rates of 15 to 25 mm/h, but 25 to 40 mm/h in possible localised downpours. Note, heavy rain easing south of the Wairoa District during Saturday evening. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal. Changes: Warning period extended and Ruahine Range downgraded to a Watch.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, with thunderstorms possible. Rainfall amounts may approach warning criteria. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate. Changes: Orange Warning downgraded to a Watch.
